sentences.en: It was made from the typical native material , buckskin, right down to the moccasins.
sentences.cn: 衣服与莫卡辛软帮鞋是用典型的本地鹿皮制作的.

sentences.en: The buckskin , finding no feed to her taste, took the trail stablewards, the bridle dragging.
sentences.cn: 那匹黄骠马找不到合意的东西吃, 就顺着小径朝马房走去, 缰绳拖在地上.

words.tran_cn: [纺]鹿皮；鹿皮装；穿鹿皮装的人

trans.tran_en: strong soft leather made from the skin of a  deer  or goat
